rules.ruleString: Must have passed 2 (I/W) units in {MPH5040, MPH5041}

description: This unit will equip students with the skills for the design, implementation and analysis of randomised controlled clinical trials.  It will enable student to formulate research question, select and recruit study subjects, compare  groups, conduct randomisation, interpret findings, manage outcomes and consider issues of ethics, budget and quality assurance.
faculty: Faculty of Medicine, Nursing and Health Sciences
